exceptions.tactic: apply filterlim_ext with (fun x : K => abs (- x)).
exceptions.exn: In environment K : AbsRing x : K H : R_UniformSpace -> Prop x0 : K The term "x0" has type "AbsRing.sort K" while it is expected to have type "R".
The LHS of abs_opp (abs (opp _)) does not match any subterm of the goal
Wrong bullet -: Current bullet - is not finished.

original: intros H. apply filterlim_ext with (fun x : K => abs (- x)). - intros x. rewrite abs_opp. reflexivity. - apply filterlim_comp with (- fun x : K => Ropp (x + 0)). + apply filterlim_comp with (fun x : K => - x). * apply filterlim_Ropp_right with (x := 0). * apply filterlim_Ropp_left with (x := 0). + eapply filter_imp. * intros x Hx. simpl in Hx. rewrite Rabs_pos_eq; auto. apply abs_ge_0. * apply filterdiff.
